content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I recall that there have been no new developments to report. However, I received a command to Google "best language learning resources" and "reviews and comparisons of language learning resources". The computer returned a list of websites that offer language learning resources, including: https://www.alllanguageresources.com/, https://www.learningresources.com/, https://www.doe.mass.edu/instruction/curate/, https://languagelearningathome.com/blog/my-honest-review-of-duolingo-for-homeschool-language-learning, https://www.fluentin3months.com/reviews/babbel-review/, https://www.nysed.gov/curriculum-instruction/supporting-all-students-resource-guides-scaffolding-instruction-english, https://www.fluentin3months.com/reviews/lingq-review/, and https://www.louisianabelieves.com/academics/ONLINE-INSTRUCTIONAL-MATERIALS-REVIEWS.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "online communities or forums for language learning resource recommendations"}}}'}]
"""
